data.title: The 25 Best Movies Like 'Five Nights at Freddy's', Ranked By Fans
data.meta_description: The 25 Best Movies Like 'Five Nights at Freddy's', Ranked By Fans, as voted on by fans. Current Top 3: Child's Play, Children of the Corn, Silent Hill
data.text:
Are you ready to dive into a cinematic journey that will keep you on the edge of your seat? If you're a fan of the spine-tingling thrills and eerie atmosphere of Five Nights at Freddy's, then you're in for a treat. We've compiled a list of the best movies that capture the same chilling essence, perfect for those who crave a good scare. These films were chosen because they feature similar themes and tones to Five Nights at Freddy's, offering a hauntingly entertaining experience for viewers craving adrenaline-pumping suspense and heart-pounding terror.

Picture yourself plunged into the depths of a nightmarish world where hidden horrors lurk around every corner. Just like in Five Nights at Freddy's, where Mike navigates through the sinister secrets of Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria, you'll find yourself on a rollercoaster of fear and intrigue in films like M3GAN and A Nightmare on Elm Street. These movies delve into the dark realms of technology gone awry and the haunting nightmares of unsuspecting victims, weaving together suspenseful narratives that will leave you breathless.

But the scares don't stop there. From the eerie urban legends of Candyman to the supernatural hauntings of The Amityville Horror, each film on this list offers a unique twist on the horror genre, guaranteed to send shivers down your spine. Whether you're a fan of paranormal activity or psychological terror, there's something here for every horror enthusiast to enjoy.

As you peruse through the list, you'll notice convenient "Where to Watch" buttons below each film, making it easy to stream your favorites on platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Max, Apple TV+, Hulu, Paramount+, and Disney+, among others. So grab your popcorn, turn down the lights, and get ready for a cinematic experience like no other.

But wait, there's more! Your voice matters in shaping the rankings of these spine-chilling films. The movies on this list have been compiled using votes from Rankers like you, so don't forget to vote up your favorite items and let your voice be heard. Together, we'll uncover the best movies to watch after Five Nights at Freddy's, ensuring that the thrills never end.
